flawed_nl_solution:
He buys 2*5=<<2*5=10>>10 drinks for his friends
So he orders 10+6=<<10+6=11>>11 total drinks.
The cost of the drinks was 11*6=$<<11*6=66>>66
So his order came out to 66+14=$<<66+14=80>>80
The tip came out to 80*0.3=$<<80*0.3=24>>24
So his order cost 80+24=$<<80+24=104>>104
Adding in the cover charge means it cost 104+20=$<<104+20=124>>124
#### 124

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 16, not 11. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
